message: You can parse words however you want. It may have been an """"accident,"""" technically. But how convenient. There is no parsing """"dead."""" Dead is dead. This """"manslaughter 'accident'"""" should not have happened in the first place. Let's see if this cop takes responsibility for his commission of manslaughter and is held accountable. Too many cops are getting acquitted for this stuff, with not even a slap on the wrist.
